forge.llmEndpoint.description: Base URL for the local LLM server (OpenAI-compatible).

forge.llmModel.description: Model name to send in chat completion requests.

forge.llmApiKey.description: Optional API key for the local LLM server.

forge.skipTargetConfirmation.description: Skip the confirmation prompt before editing the active file.

forge.skipConfirmations.description: Automatically accept confirmation prompts (apply changes, git workflow, commit, push).

forge.showDiffPreview.description: Show a diff preview tab before applying changes.

forge.autoValidation.description: Automatically select and run the best validation command (test > typecheck > lint > build).

forge.enableMultiFile.description: Allow the LLM to edit multiple files in one run.

forge.autoFixValidation.description: Attempt to auto-fix validation failures using the LLM.

forge.autoFixMaxRetries.description: Maximum number of auto-fix attempts after validation fails.

forge.llmTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for LLM requests.

forge.verboseLogs.description: Show verbose diagnostic logs in the Forge output panel.

forge.keepAliveSeconds.description: Ping the LLM every N seconds to keep it warm (0 disables).

forge.enableGitWorkflow.description: Enable the Git workflow (status, commit, push) after changes.
